description.en:
Werewolves, demons, monsters, vampires. All these ferocious creatures are afraid of the same thing: the beautiful Princess Hime, an awesome warrior who fights off the forces of evil with a chainsaw and a smile. Not only does she look great in a tiara, she has power that allows her to raise the dead. She's a girl on a mission, and with the help of her undead servant and a supercute robot, there's no creature of darkness she can't take down!

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/232-princess-resurrection?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/princess-resurrection)

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

altTitles.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

description.en:
A mysterious man named "Ryo" who has lost his memory wakes up in a different world populated by monster girls (fantasy species) that easily surpass the power of humans. He possesses a certain power, the skill of "charm", which forces him to increase the likability of all monster girls!
Despite his distress, Ryo uses his power to seduce all kinds of monster girls and build a harem. All in order to achieve a certain goal...!

Eros and carnage intersect in this otherworldly adventure tale that opens at!
description.ja:
人間の力を軽く凌駕するモンスター娘（幻想種）が跋扈する異世界で目覚めた、記憶を失った謎の男「リョウ」。そんな彼にはある力、モンスター娘たちすべての好感度を強制的に上げる「魅了」のスキルを所持していた!!
苦悩しつつもリョウは己の力を使いあらゆるモンスター娘を篭絡し、ハーレムを築く。すべてはある目的を遂行するため…!!!

**エロスと殺戮が交差する、エロティック異世界冒険譚 開幕――!!!!!!**
description.pt-br:
Um homem misterioso, conhecido como *"Ryou"*, que perdeu suas memórias, acorda em um mundo paralelo populado por mulheres monstro que possuem poderes que ultrapassam qualquer limite humano. No entanto, esse mesmo homem possui um poder, a habilidade conhecida como *"Charme"*, que lhe permite interferir na psique dessas *"criaturas fantásticas"*!
Apesar do contínuo sentimento de *"inquietação"*, Ryou usará sua habilidade para seduzir todo tipo de criatura fantástica, assim criando um harém, tudo para que seja possível alcançar um certo objetivo...

**Gore e erotismo se cruzam nesta aventura em um mundo paralelo!**

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

description.en:
Ga-eun is a junior in college who lives with her younger brother, a senior in high school. Ever since their parents' death, she has tried to stay strong and confident amidst juggling school and raising her brother. And after getting dumped by her boyfriend, dating is the last thing on her mind... until she gets involved with three of her brother’s friends. Which one will she choose? The cheeky, handsome childhood friend Dowan? The calm, collected, and responsible class president Sangu? Or the quiet and intimidating but kind-hearted Jun?

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dididepengyou/list?title_no=1633)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/siblings-friend/list?title_no=3081)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)
description.id:
Gaeun, mahasiswi yang sedang tinggal bersama adiknya setelah orang tuanya meninggal. Setelah putus dengan pacarnya, Ia memutuskan untuk tidak akan berpacaran lagi. Tapi semuanya berubah setelah ia bertemu teman-teman adiknya! Akhirnya Gaeun pun menikah dengan salah satu teman adiknya. Pertanyaannya adalah, siapakah calon suaminya...?!

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dididepengyou/list?title_no=1633)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/siblings-friend/list?title_no=3081)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)
description.ja:
高校生の弟と二人で暮らす大学生の加奈。彼氏に振られもう恋愛はしないと思っていたが、突然弟の友達である男子高生3人と奇妙な関係に…！ 数年後、加奈と結婚したのは果たして―⁉

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dididepengyou/list?title_no=1633)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/siblings-friend/list?title_no=3081)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)
description.ko:
사고로 부모님이 돌아가신 후 고등학생인 남동생과 둘이 살고 있는 대학교 3학년 가은.
아픔을 겉으로 티내지 않고 밝고 자신감 있게 살고 있다고 본인은 생각 중이다.
딱 자기 취향이었던 남자 친구에게 차인 후 더 이상 연애를 하지 않겠다고 생각했지만,
어릴 때부터 알고 지내던 아는 동생 도완, 동생의 반 반장 상우,알바 중인 미술학원 수강생 준과 엮이며
별안간 연하남들의과 미묘한 분위기가 된다.
동생 친구와 결혼하기로 했다며 친구들에게 청첩장을 건네는 가은. 과연 셋 중 누구와 결혼하게 될까...?

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dididepengyou/list?title_no=1633)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/siblings-friend/list?title_no=3081)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)
description.zh:
最甜不过姐弟恋！
当三个弟弟同时追求我！
父母意外去世后，读大三的嘉恩独自带着弟弟生活。在被男友甩后，嘉恩认为自己再也无法得到爱了。然而渐渐地，嘉恩发现自己开始被奇妙的姻缘围绕——从小一起长大，亲弟弟般的斗焕、弟弟的班长尚宇、美术生小俊。多年后，朋友们收到了嘉恩的婚礼请柬，听说新郎是年下男? 到底新郎是他们中哪一个呢?

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/dididepengyou/list?title_no=1633)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/siblings-friend/list?title_no=3081)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)
description.zh-hk:
大三的佳恩自從父母意外過世後，便和高中生弟弟相依為命。正當佳恩認為自己沒有表露傷痛，活得開朗又有自信時，慘遭天菜男友狠甩。佳恩本來決定不再談戀愛，可是認識多年的鄰家弟弟道宛、親弟弟班上的班長尚宇、在她打工的美術補習班上課的隼走進了她的生活，和這些弟弟相處的氣氛也逐漸微妙。後來，佳恩決定和弟弟的朋友結婚，並向朋友遞出喜帖。究竟在三人當中，誰才是她的新郎…？

---

- [Official English Translation <Tappytoon>](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/my-younger-brothers-friend)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/friendsofbrother/list?title_no=2773)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001339)

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

altTitles.ja: 同居人が不安定でして

description.en: A story about the daily lives of two roommates, Fuantei-san, a slightly unstable illustrator, and Shikkari-san, a capable career woman.

title.en: Hell Mode: Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market.

Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds.

All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

description.en:
Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.  
  
Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.

There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus, however, the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.
Digital colored version of Akira Toriyama's original best selling manga

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

title.en: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1

altTitles.ja: レベル1から始まる召喚無双~俺だけ使える裏ダンジョンで、全ての転生者をぶっちぎる

altTitles.ja-ro: Level 1 kara Hajimaru Shoukan Musou: Ore dake Tsukaeru Ura Dungeon de, Subete no Tenseisha o Bucchigiru

altTitles.en: Unrivaled Summoner Starts From Level 1: Destroy All the Reincarnated People in the Secret Dungeon That Only I Can Use

description.en:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
description.id:
Shinobu Iijima kehilangan nyawanya bersama adik perempuan,
 Ketika dia bangun, dia sudah bereinkarnasi di dunia game yang dia mainkan.
 Shinobu putus asa untuk memulai permainan dari awal setelah ayah angkatnya menghapus data gamenya, tetapi dia mengetahui bahwa adik perempuannya akan segera bereinkarnasi di dunia ini juga.
 Untuk menghentikan ayah angkatnya menjadi pemain top yang mengincar tubuh adik perempuannya, dia akan memulai jalan menuju yang paling menyakitkan ...!

description.en: Yu Xiang unfortunately transmigrates into a merchant's daughter, who was mistakenly taken to the marquis manor at birth. She is immediately disabled, and carries the nickname of 'disaster star'. Helplessly, she can only cling to her older brother, the marquis, in hopes of surviving, and wait for the true master to return so she can give way. Years later, when the true master returns to the manor, Yu Xiang prepares to leave. however, she finds out her clinging technique is too good, that her marquis brother won't let her leave!
description.fr:
Yu Xiang donne, handicapée, échange son coeur avec celui de son frère. 
Après sa mort, elle se réincarne dans le corps d'une fille qui porte le même nom, est paralysée comme elle et qui est surnommée l'étoile malchanceuse. 
Yu Xiang réalise alors qu'elle est dans le roman qu'elle lisait avant de mourir. Synopsis du roman en question : Yu Xiang, fille de marchand a été échangée à la naissance avec la fille d'un Seigneur.
description.zh: 虞襄很不幸穿成了被抱到侯府的商家女，一来就双腿残废，脑袋上还顶着个‘丧门星’的称号。 无奈之下只得牢牢抱住侯爷哥哥的大腿，先把日子混下去，等正主儿回来就麻溜的让位。 几年之后正主儿回归，虞襄包袱款款准备走人，却发现抱大腿的技术太专业，侯爷哥哥不让走了！

description.en:
"Please don’t touch the guy wearing glasses…"
Department head Kim, who quit his job as a special agent only for his daughter Minji and chose to be normal. Then one day, Minji disappeared silently, and Manager Kim began to find his daughter by turning the country that monitors him into the enemy.
description.ko:
제발 안경 쓴 아저씨는 건들지 말자.
오직 자신의 딸 '민지'를 위해 특수요원직을 관두고 평범함을 선택한 가장 김부장.
그러던 어느 날 민지가 소리소문 없이 사라지고, 김부장은 자신을 감시하는 국가를 적으로 돌리면서까지 딸을 찾아나서기 시작하는데...
[외모지상주의], [싸움독학] 그리고 [인생존망]을 잇는 박태준 유니버스의 공식 스핀오프 작품!
description.ru:
Пожалуйста, не трогайте мужчину в очках.
Менеджер Ким, глава семьи, который бросил работу специализированного агента и выбрал простую жизнь ради своей дочери Мин Джи.
Однажды в один прекрасный день Мин Джи исчезает, не говорив ни слова , и менеджер Ким начинает искать свою дочь, постепенно превращая страну, которая следит за ним, во врага...
description.pt-br: Pai solteiro, gerente de companhia e ex membro das forças especiais. O Sr. Kim vivia uma vida normal até sua filha, Minji, desaparecer. Depois de descobrir que ela poderia estar morta, o Sr. Kim parte em uma busca implacável por informações. Ele irá resgatar Minji a qualquer custo, mesmo que isso signifique destruir tudo e todos que cruzarem seu caminho.

description.en: After moving to Tokyo, Itou Kaiji is living a life of self-indulgence when one day he is forced by Endou, a financier, to pay off a debt he once co-signed. At Endou's invitation, Kaiji boards the gambling ship "Espoir," which offers debtors the chance to pay off their debts in full. The game is "Restricted Rock-Paper-Scissors" using 12 cards. If he wins, his debts are wiped out, but if he loses, his life is forfeit...

altTitles.en: The Dragon, the Hero, and the Courier

altTitles.fr: Le dragon, le héros, et la coursière

altTitles.pt-br: O dragão, o herói e o carteiro

altTitles.it: Il drago, l'eroe e il corriere

description.en:
"Hello fellow citizens. I am Yoshida the half-elf, working for the post office of the Imperial City of Idazig. My job is to deliver letters and documents to wherever you need them to be, whether it be a castle in the sky or the bottom of an abyss."

This is a comedy written by the biggest Middle-Ages geek, hitting the fantasy genre from an entirely new angle!

altTitles.ja: ちょっとだけ抜けちゃう柊さん

description.en: Kotori-kun, who falls in love with his classmate Hiiragi-san at first sight, somehow wants to get close to her. Hiiragi-san is quite an earnest and lovely girl, but… She’s surprisingly a little careless--! This is about the charming school life of a careless girl and a pure boy who gets led on everyday by her -- a romantic comedy that’s a wee bit H sometimes but warm and fluffy to death.

title.en: The Kouhai who Went from Introvert to Influencer

altTitles.ja: 後輩は陰キャ上がりのインフルエンサー

altTitles.pt-br: A Caloura Anti-social é uma Influencer em Ascenção

altTitles.ja-ro: Kouhai wa Inkya Agari no Infuruensaa

altTitles.es-la: Una kohai que fue introvertida ahora es streamer

description.en:
After years of missed connections, our protagonist reunites with the junior he got along well with in high school. However, apparently, she has become a famous influencer.

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/1722837/series/225813)
description.tr: Yıllarca süren ayrılıktan sonra kahramanımız, lise yıllarında iyi anlaştığı alt sınıfıyla yeniden bir araya gelir. Ancak görünüşe göre o artık bir internet ünlüsüdür.
description.pt-br: Após anos de desencontros, nosso protagonista reencontra a caloura com quem se dava bem no ensino médio. Porém, aparentemente, ela se tornou uma famosa influenciadora.

description.en: The handsome and affectionate pilot Zhou Jingze x the gentle and firm doctor Xu Sui. Summer is always hot, and so is the boy I love. Watch "Infatuated Prodigal Son" Zhou Jingze perform this role.
description.zh: 痞帅深情飞行员周京泽x温软坚定医生许随。夏天永远热烈，我爱的少年也是。看“痴情浪子”周京泽演绎这一份情有独钟。

title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.en: I Will Make an Effort to Change the Genre

altTitles.ja: ジャンル、変えさせて頂きます！

altTitles.en: It’s Time to Change the Genre

description.en:
I reincarnated into my favorite genre for novels.

I became the villainous aunt who mistreats the young protagonist. I felt sorry for my nephew who would grow up as the protagonist in a revengeful plot, so I’ll try my best to take care of my nephew until his uncle shows up and takes him as per the original plot.

But then…

“M-Mom!”

I’ve become his mother all of a sudden?

“I don’t know your circumstances, but how could I bear to separate a mother from her son? Lady, come with us to Winterwald.”

Hey, Kim Luca! How are you going to fix this misunderstanding?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9E%A5%EB%A5%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%B0%94%EA%BF%94%EB%B3%B4%EB%8F%84%EB%A1%9D-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2494)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/I-Will-Change-the-Genre/3487)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74301)

This is a story about: a female lead who transforms into a child after losing her virginity, her identity switches between an adult and a kid. With the crown prince who has a dual personality too, there's equal parts love and bite.

altTitles.ja: まんきつしたい常連さん

altTitles.en: Miss Regular Customer Wants to Enjoy
The Regular Enjoying Herself at the Manga Cafe

description.en:
Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!

title.en: My Female Sword Master, Who I Live With, Is So Cute That I’m Happy Every Day

altTitles.ja: 同居している剣聖の女師匠が可愛すぎて毎日幸せです

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyo Shiteiru Kensei no Onna Shishou ga Kawaisugite Mainichi Shiawase Desu

description.en:
Eugene Dawson is a young man with a goal; to become strong.
He trains under and lives with his mentor, Liza Parsandra, who is regarded as a Sword Saint.

In terms of physical prowess, Liza is without equal, and despite her scatterbrained nature, Eugene still enjoys each day with his adorable mentor.

However, her defenseless nature, drop-dead gorgeous looks and tendency towards unintentional skin-ship make training feel like an impossible task...!?

"Is this really going to help me get stronger!?"
description.ja:
強くなりたいと望む少年、ユージン・ドーソンは、
剣聖と謳われた師匠・リザ・パルサンドラの元で住み込みで修行中。

腕っぷしは最強だけど、私生活はポンコツで可愛い師匠との日常は毎日幸せ･･･
かと思いきや、無防備でエッチな体と無自覚なスキンシップに修行どころではないようで･･･!?
こんなので俺、強くなれるの!?

description.en: The daily life of C (Say) and her older sister G (Gee) as they guess about what life used to be like in the ruins of a strange city.

Even if today disappears, these feelings will not.
An everyday in which nothing happens, with each day slightly different than the last.
The slightly strange story of her, and me, and our clumsy feelings.

Only I remember that there were three entrance ceremonies this year. Only I remember the unchosen days. The world, repeating 'todays' like a broken record...

"My name is Inaba Michiru. Nice to meet you."

A story about her, who befriended me the following day as well. About my first human relationship, about the gradually shrinking distance between us, and my quietly changing feelings...

A slightly strange story about a friendless, loveless me, and her, and our clumsy feelings.

altTitles.en: No Longer Allowed In Another World

description.en:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers–sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

---

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book Ningen Shikkaku (No Longer Human/Disqualified From Being Human).
description.ru: После неудачного двойного самоубийства, наш главный герой переносится в другой мир. И чтобы не случилось, он обещает, что найдёт свою любовь и в этом мире, и опять покончит с собой.
description.uk: Як і у відомій книзі Осаму Дадзая "Бракована людина" / "Крах людини", головний герой цієї історії намагається вчинити подвійне самогубство зі своєю коханою... але замість цього його збиває вантажівка і він потрапляє в інший світ. Тепер він хоче знайти свою кохану, щоб знову покінчити життя самогубством разом з нею.
description.pt-br: Em 13 de junho de 1948, o autor Osamu Dazai estava prestes a se suicidar com Shizuko Ota mas foi convocado para outro mundo. Agora ele quer encontrar a reencarnação de sua amante, para que possa cometer suicídio com ela.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: Skill Lender’s Retrieving (Tale) ～I Told You It’s 10% Per 10 Days at First, Didn’t I?~

altTitles.ja-ro: Gikou Taichi no Torikaeshi ~ Toichi tte Saisho ni itta yo na ~

altTitles.ja: 技巧貸与＜スキル・レンダー＞のとりかえし～トイチって最初に言ったよな？～

altTitles.ja-ro: Skill Lender no Torikaeshi - Toichi tte Saisho ni Itta yo na?

altTitles.en: "Skill Lender" Gets Back His Pride～Before I Started Lending, I Told You This Loan Charges 10% Interest Every 10 Days, Right?～

altTitles.zh-hk: 技能藉貸《Skill·Lender》 的取回～一開始不就告訴你們每十日加一成利息嗎？～

altTitles.zh: 技能藉贷《Skill· Lender》 的取回~一开始不就告诉你们每十日加一成利息吗？ ～

altTitles.ja-ro: Gikō Taiyo < Skill Lender > no Torikaeshi ~ Toichi tte Saisho ni Itta Yo na?~

altTitles.id: "Skill Lender" Mendapatkan Kembali Kebanggaannya～Sebelum aku Meminjamkan, Aku Sudah Memberitahumu bahwa Pinjaman Ini Membebankan Bunga 10% Setiap 10 Hari, kan?～

description.en: Marz, who has the unique skill [Lender's Skill], lends the acquired skills and contributes to the party. However, after being betrayed by his friends, Marz takes back the skills he lent them. Marz who became the weakest to the strongest began to take the path of revenge and counterattack!
description.id: Marge, yang memiliki skill unik [peminjaman keterampilan = Skill Lender], meminjamkan keterampilan yang diperoleh dan berkontribusi pada party. Namun, setelah dikhinati teman-temannya, Marge mengambil kembali keterampilan yang dia pinjamkan kepada mereka. Marge yang menjadi yang terlemah hingga yang terkuat mulai menempuh jalur balas dendam dan serangan balik!

altTitles.ja: おっちょこドジおねえさん

description.en:
She may seem like a beautiful, sophisticated woman! But on the inside, she is just a XXX lady. The more she tries to act like an mature adult in front of younger boys, the more twisted and perverted she gets! A popular love-comedy that has received over 300,000 likes on Twitter.

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Place to Buy - [cmoa](https://www.cmoa.jp/title/263649/)
description.es-la: ¡Puede parecer una mujer hermosa y sofisticada! Pero por dentro, es solo una dama XXX. Cuanto más trata de actuar como una adulta madura frente a los niños más pequeños, ¡más retorcida y pervertida se vuelve!

altTitles.ja: だらしないです 堀田先生！

description.en: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

Cute innocent children, who are actually cold-blooded, blood-sucking devils. Our protagonist believing himself to be just an ordinary person, out of nowhere, has become a target of these cute little devils, who are hunting him down for the kill! During the run for his life, our male-lead discovers there are secrets lurking within his own body; his life up until that juncture, turning out to be a well-crafted lie. Burgeoning desire vs rationality; fleeing vs vengeance; now confronted with these choices, which will he choose!
description.es: Niños lindos e inocentes, que en realidad son demonios de sangre fría y chupadores de sangre. Nuestro protagonista, creyéndose una persona normal y corriente, de la nada, se ha convertido en el blanco de estos pequeños demonios, ¡que lo están persiguiendo para matarlo! Durante la carrera por su vida, nuestro protagonista masculino descubre que hay secretos que acechan dentro de su propio cuerpo; su vida hasta ese momento, resulta ser una mentira bien elaborada. Deseo floreciente vs. racionalidad; huir vs. venganza; ahora se enfrenta a estas elecciones, ¿¡qué es lo que elegirá!?"

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality! The opening of a romantic comedy that will stir up your protective instincts!!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！ あなたの庇護欲を掻き立てる、よわよわラブコメ開幕!!

altTitles.vi: Những nàng lọ lem ngọt ngào của tiệm bánh

description.en: "I want my little sister to eat a cake!" Minori, a male college student, decided to work part-time at a super popular cake shop with that in mind. The shop is located inside a school for young ladies!? Can a boy bad at communicating, who can't even look straight in the eye and speak properly run a cake shop with four JK patissiers? Enjoy a teen romantic comedy sweeter than a cake♪
description.ja:
妹にケーキを食べさせたい！」その一心で超人気洋菓子店でのバイトを始めることに決めた男子大学生のみのり。しかしその店があるのはなんと“お嬢様学校の中”！？　まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障男子がJKパティシエ4人とともにお店を切り盛りできるのか？　ケーキよりも甘～い青春ラブコメをご賞味あれ!

まともに目を見てしゃべれないコミュ障大学生の季村みのり。妹にケーキを食べさせたい一心で超人気洋菓子店でバイトに応募したがそこはなんとお嬢様学校の構内にある店だった！　春宮苺、夏野もも、秋山林檎、冬月みかん、４人のJKパティシエと一緒にお店を切り盛りすることに!?

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

description.en:
When ten criminal acts collide, what's going to happen!?  
  
From the creator of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

description.en:
“If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself.”

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie.

Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on! Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight!

The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history!

See the colorful characters and the thrilling battles come to life in this visual retelling of the light novel series by Doufu Mayoi.

---
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/) (Raw)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

altTitles.en: The Reality of a Co-ed High School

description.en: A comedic take on the daily lives of students in a co-ed high school.
description.ja:
チャンスなら転がっている！！ちょっとだけドキドキする……でも、進展しない！！盛り上がりそうで盛り上がらない毎日を悶々と過ごす男女の人間模様を描く、全く新しい草食系恋愛コメディー。

---

Chansunara korogatte iru!! Chotto dake dokidoki suru…… demo, shinten shinai!! Moriagari-sōde moriagaranai mainichi o monmon to sugosu danjo no ningen moyō o kaku, mattaku atarashī sōshoku-kei ren'ai komedī.

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii

altTitles.ja: 通りがかりにワンポイントアドバイスしていくタイプのヤンキー

altTitles.th: พี่โจ๋ ONE POINT ปรึกษาฟรีไม่คิดตังค์

altTitles.ko: 지나가는 길에 원포인트 어드바이스를 하는 양아치

altTitles.ja-ro: Toorigakari ni One Point Advice shite Iku Type no Yankee

description.en: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
description.es: Sakurai parece un delincuente, pero inmediatamente aconseja a la gente que encuentra. Aquellos que lo conocen por primera vez se asustan frecuentemente con su apariencia amenazante, pero a través de sus consejos, se dan cuenta de que tan querido y bueno puede ser. Lentamente, el círculo de allegados de Sakurai empieza a crecer. El es bueno, considerado, con experiencia y versatilidad en todos lo deportes! Hoy, el super-adepto Sakurai, quien tiene una brecha enorme entre su apariencia y su personalidad, continúa dandole consejos inmediatos a varias personas, mejorándoles su día un poquito.
description.pt-br: Sakurai-san parece um yankee, mas dá às pessoas que passa um conselho pontual. Aqueles que o encontram pela primeira vez muitas vezes ficam assustados com sua aparência assustadora, mas através dos conselhos, eles aprendem como ele pode ser bondoso. Lentamente, o círculo de pessoas de Sakurai começou a crescer. Ele é gentil, atencioso, experiente e versátil em todas as formas de esportes … !! Hoje, o superespecial Sakurai, que tem uma lacuna ridícula em sua aparência e personalidade, continua a dar conselhos de um ponto para várias pessoas, tornando seu dia um pouco melhor.

altTitles.it: Cronache dalla Fondazione di un Impero in un Altro Mondo

altTitles.pt-br: Crônicas da Fundação de um Império em Outro Mundo

description.en:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
description.fr:
Un protagoniste renaît dans un autre monde, se réincarnant en tant qu'enfant abandonné. Autour de lui, d'autres enfants abandonnés sont dans la même situation. Pour survivre, il les guide dans l'agriculture. Peu à peu, des orphelins se rassemblent et, attirés par les rumeurs d'un village, d'autres commencent à arriver.

Le groupe d'enfants finit par former un véritable village sans que personne ne s'en aperçoive. Bientôt, plusieurs pays voisins commencent à sy 'intéresser. Voici l'épopée de l'homme qui sera plus tard connu sous le nom de l'Empereur Divin.
description.it:
Il protagonista rinasce in un altro mondo.
A quanto pare, sembra che si sia reincarnato in un bambino orfano.
Poco dopo, si trova davanti altri bambini abbandonati come lui.
Per poter sopravvivere, si mette alla loro guida ed iniziano a coltivare.
Poco per volta, iniziano così a creare un villaggio. Arrivano altri orfani. Ma anche come la voce di questa comunità si diffonde, persone di tutti i tipi.
Questo gruppo, partito come nient'altro che un gruppo di bambini, diventa quindi un villaggio prima di rendersene conto.
Ed è così, che i diversi Paesi circostanti iniziano ad interessarsi a loro.
Questa è l'epica storia dell'uomo che in seguito sarebbe stato conosciuto come il Divo Imperatore.
description.pt-br:
Um protagonista renascido em outro mundo.  Aparentemente ele reencarnou como uma criança abandonada.  Diante de seus olhos estavam crianças abandonadas como ele.  Para sobreviver, ele os conduziu à agricultura.  Aos poucos, os órfãos foram se reunindo e, ao ouvirem rumores de uma aldeia, outros começaram a migrar.

 O grupo que não passava de crianças tornou-se uma aldeia antes que alguém percebesse.  Então vários países do entorno começaram a ficar de olho nisso.  Esta é a história épica do homem que mais tarde seria conhecido como o Divino Imperador

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.en: Leisurely Farmer in an Alternate Universe
Carefree Farmer in a Different Dimension

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: Magic Artisan Dahlia Wilts No More

altTitles.ja: 魔導具師ダリヤはうつむかない ～Dahliya Wilts No More～

altTitles.en: Magic Artisan Dahliya Won't Hang Her Head ~Dahliya Wilts No More~

altTitles.ja-ro: Madougushi Dahliya wa Utsumukanai ~Dahliya Wilts No More~

altTitles.en: Dahlia in Bloom: Crafting a Fresh Start with Magical Tools

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔導具師妲莉亞不向人低頭～Dahliya Wilts No More～

description.en: Waterproof Slime Cloth, Small Magic Stove, Artificial Magic Sword and Fairy Crystal Glasses… Using her knowledge from before she reincarnated for innovative ideas, Dahliya immersed herself in creating her beloved magic devices full of cheerful feelings. Enjoying her second chance at life, the curtain opens on this otherworldly craftsmanship fantasy!

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?
